text.section: Subject to § 3-515 of this subtitle, the Department may allow any county in this State to participate in an issue of bonds under this subtitle.

On the date designated by the Department, a county that desires to participate shall notify the Department of:
Its desire to participate in the proceeds of the next series of bonds to be issued under this subtitle;
The proposed amount of its participation; and
A description of the revenues to be pledged by the county to pay debt service on the bonds.
The Department may extend the date for notification when appropriate.
